search_general_talk_02/4401_1031_0200_10: Pasio is my stage to shine!
search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0100_10:
Oh, are you scouting new talent?
Why, of course! I’d be happy to...
search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0200_10:
Huh? A mysterious ring?
What are you talking about?
search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0300_10:
Ugh... I gave you my best smile thinking you were
scouting for models! Now you just want to ask
me questions? How lame.
search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0400_10:
Teleporting across the world through rings, huh?
Um...did you hit your head or something?
How does that even sound possible to you?
search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0500_10:
Some important-looking person asked me 
something or another like that back there, too.
Why don’t you go ask them?
search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0100_10:
A good mode of transport
is essential to having
a great adventure!
search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0200_10:
I’m certain that how I
came to Pasio was the
best way.
search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0300_10:
But I wonder how I should
get home...
search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0100_10: Hm. You want to know how I came to Pasio?
search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0200_10:
I came by ferry, same as everybody else.
It was such a nice trip!
search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0300_10: Another way to travel? I haven’t heard of one.
search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0400_10: If there is one, maybe I’ll try that out to get home.
search_general_talk_02/4402_0702_0100_10:
A mysterious ring? I don’t think I saw one on
the ferry... Hmmm... A mysterious ring...
search_general_talk_02/4402_0702_0200_10:
Maybe a Pokémon has something to do with it.
If that’s the case, I think there’s a gentleman up
ahead who mentioned something like that.
search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0100_10:
Did you know that this island is completely
artificial? We were on the construction team that
built it!
search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0200_10:
Pretty sweet, huh? Looks like a real island now
that all these people showed up! Guess our
hard work really paid off!
search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0300_10:
He says that, but it’s really his Machamp
that did the hard work.
search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0400_10:
Don’t become a grown-up like him. Remember
that you work together with your Pokémon!
search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0100_10:
I heard that somebody saw some strange things
around here... Are you interested in that, too?
search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0200_10: I see! Then we are kindred spirits!
search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0300_10:
If you find anything out of the ordinary, 
please let me know.
If you don’t...
search_general_talk_02/4405_0701_0100_10:
Come on, let’s go back. 
There aren’t any rare Pokémon around here.
search_general_talk_02/4405_0701_0300_10:
Aaah! There’s something there! Nonononono!
Let’s get out of here!
search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0100_10:
Oh no, I’ve been spotted! 
P-please, d-don’t open up another hole!
I don’t wanna be taken anywhere else!
search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0200_10:
Who...who are you?
Are you one of its minions?!
search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0300_10:
I’m sorry, I’m sorry!
Here, take this and leave me alone!
search_general_talk_02/4601_0702_0100_10:
Be careful of holes! They’ll transport you all over
the place! Eeek!
search_general_talk_02/4501_0701_0100_10:
Hey, there you are!
A researcher guy asked me to look for you.
search_general_talk_02/4501_0701_0200_10:
He told me to help out a Trainer wearing a hat
who was traveling with a Pikachu!
search_general_talk_02/4501_0702_0100_10:
I don’t know what that was all about,
but I think I did my job well!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0100_10:
You’re looking for a strange Pokémon?
What a coincidence! I am, too!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0200_10:
By the way, what information do you have?
Will you share it with me? Come on.
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0300_10:
You only know of a mysterious hoop? That’s it?
No, you’re hiding something, aren’t you?
Why aren’t you telling me? Huh?!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0400_10:
Fine! Pokémon battle! Now!
And if I win, you tell me everything!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0402_10:
I swear I’ll get to the bottom of this mysterious
Pokémon puzzle...and you’re going to help me!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0404_10: Fine, then! I suppose I can wait a little longer!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0405_10:
You’re back! This time I won’t let you go without
a battle! Tell me everything you know about that
mysterious Pokémon!
search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0200_10:
Oh gosh, I’m so sorry. I just lost my temper and
saw red.
search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0300_10:
I like Pokémon so much that people around me
say that I’m a bit of a weirdo.
search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0400_10:
If there is a strange Pokémon around here,
I think I can really relate to it.
